Template used: "What should I do if my package says delivered but I don't have it?"; last updated: 2025-10-24 16:24:01.166

Elevated Faith: I'm sorry to hear that. Checking here, your order #1626444 does indeed show that it was delivered February 14, 2026, at 09:35 AM PT. You can check further updates here: https://elevatedfaith.attn.tv/aNHt_9nGDrSJ
If your tracking says the package was delivered but you haven't received it, I recommend checking around your home and with nearby houses, just in case it was dropped off by mistake. Also, check with anyone you live with, like family, roommates, or a landlord, to see if they accepted it for you. Sometimes packages are also held by property managers, an apartment office, or even your local post office. Let me know if you can't find it, I'm here to help!

send_to_cs: Send to CS for legal and fraud related inquires
Send to CS for product safety inquires and threats
Send to CS for website technical issues
escalate: ESC if cx claims bodily injury as result of a product
ESC if cx highlights dangers to health/safety as a result of product
templates: For all post-purchase & warranty inquiries use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For discount code issues use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
For product info that you can't find on the site use "SUPPORT" temp (SPT)
If cx reach out about 90 qt cooler recall, use shortcut RCC
For custom order cancellation and edit requests, don't use CED, use the designated templates instead

Igloo: Thank you for being so interested. The best way to continue help with this request is to text "SUPPORT" and you will be directed to another team member. Please do not send images via text as we cannot view them. In these cases, you may email us directly using customerservice@shop.igloocoolers.com or give us a call at 1-800-273-7024. 

Please note that our team is available Monday - Friday 8:00am - 5:00pm PST.

Anything we can help with today? Text back with any questions!
I just lost a screw to the ear piece of one of my pair of Shady Rays. Is there a way to get a replacement screw?
Shady Rays: If you'd like to replace your item that was purchased within the last 30 days you can do so at https://shadyrays.attn.tv/azeukvMEPCmh/ Our team is happy to help.
They were not purchased in the last 30 days.
Is there not a way to get a replacement screw?

Shady Rays: I understand how inconvenient that is. At this time, we don't provide individual replacement screws for frames. If your sunglasses are outside the 30-day return window, you may still qualify for our Lifetime Craftsmanship Warranty. That means we can replace your pair for a small fee if it's damaged or missing parts. You can start that process here: https://shadyrays.attn.tv/aqsAdD2t6q10 Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

conversation.message_text:
Howitzer Clothing: Hey Kaleb, we noticed you checking us out. Have you seen our best sellers yet? https://howitzerclothing.attn.tv/adH7dxzhIMrj 

Text back with any questions!
Order was placed and I need to cancel
Howitzer Clothing: I understand! The best way to check if you can cancel or edit your order is to email our support team directly at customerservice@howitzerclothing.com
Already did no answer

Howitzer Clothing: Sorry to hear that! Rest assured, our team is doing everything to respond to each inquiry in a timely manner. They should follow up with you in no time! If you don't see the team's response in your inbox, be sure to check your spam and promo folders, sometimes our emails end up there as well.
Can you get me in contact with someone to call me please?
I need to talk to a customer support agent
Howitzer Clothing: I'm sorry about that! This number is for SMS only, so I'm not able to make or receive calls. You can give us a call at 1-855-717-3963, Monday - Friday from 9:00 am - 5:00 pm PST.
I am but nobody is answering my calls or my emails

Howitzer Clothing: We sincerely apologize for the wait! As much as I would love to help out directly, I'm afraid my access is limited, and the team is better equipped to assist you. They are experiencing a high volume of emails, but they'll respond to you as soon as possible. Please check your spam and promo folders, as sometimes our emails end up there. We appreciate your patience on this!
Still no answer from phone call or email please connect me with someone

Howitzer Clothing: As mentioned earlier, I truly apologize that I'm unable to assist with this directly, as my system isn't equipped to handle this type of issue. Our team is working hard to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible, and you should hear back from them very soon.
I just want to return it and get my money back in my account ASAP
Howitzer Clothing: I truly apologize that I'm not able to resolve this directly. Our team is actively working through inquiries and will get back to you as soon as possible.
